summary: The module provides a highâ€‘level interface for interacting with OGC Web Map Service (WMS) endpoints. It parses WMS capabilities documents, abstracts version differences (1.1.1 and 1.3.0), discovers available layers, builds request URLs, and retrieves map images or feature information while handling authentication and XML namespace issues.
business_intent: To enable applications and services to integrate external geospatial map data by programmatically accessing WMS servers, facilitating map rendering, layer discovery, and feature queries within GIS and mapping workflows.
